name: Zoom Cube! A Techno Cube Game
name_original: Zoom Cube! A Techno Cube Game
description:
Escape an underground cyber-prison bunker and dodge your way to the end! Featuring a bangin soundtrack from Sienna Sleep to lure you into a techno trance.  

This neon speed game will test your quick reaction skills through an intense obstacle course.  Collect Lucky Gems and beat your previous times to unlock new cubes! 

Sienna Sleep's Soundcloud

Halara Studios ig

Made by Elijah Johnson and Brendan Woolley
